sentences.chinese: 中牟共侯單右車
sentences.literal: Zhongmou Gong Marquis Shan You Che
sentences.idiomatic: Marquis Gong of Zhongmou: Shan You Che

sentences.chinese: 以卒從沛，入漢，以郎擊布，功侯，二千二百戶。始高祖微時有急，給高祖馬，故得侯。
sentences.literal: As soldier followed from Pei, entered Han, as Gentleman attacked Bu, merited marquisate, 2,200 households. Initially when Gaozu was in humble circumstances had emergency, provided Gaozu horse, therefore obtained marquisate.
sentences.idiomatic: As a soldier he followed from Pei, entered Han service, and as a Gentleman attacked Bu, achieving merit and a marquisate of 2,200 households. Earlier, when Gaozu was in dire straits, he had provided Gaozu with a horse, which is why he received the marquisate.

sentences.chinese: 十二年十月乙未封，二十三年薨。
sentences.literal: Enfeoffed in twelfth year tenth month yiwei day, died after twenty-three years.
sentences.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiwei day of the tenth month in the twelfth year, died twenty-three years later.

sentences.chinese: 百二十五
sentences.literal: One hundred twenty-five

sentences.chinese: 孝文八年，敬侯繒嗣，五年薨。
sentences.literal: In Xiaowen eighth year, Jing Marquis Zeng succeeded, died after five years.
sentences.idiomatic: In Emperor Xiaowen's eighth year, Marquis Jing Zeng succeeded to the title, dying five years later.

sentences.chinese: 十三年，戴侯終根嗣，三十七年薨。
sentences.literal: In thirteenth year, Dai Marquis Zhong Gen succeeded, died after thirty-seven years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the thirteenth year, Marquis Dai Zhong Gen succeeded to the title, dying thirty-seven years later.

sentences.chinese: 元光二年，侯舜嗣，十八年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
sentences.literal: In Yuanguang second year, Marquis Shun succeeded, eighteen years later, in Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine gold, dismissed.
sentences.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanguang, Marquis Shun succeeded to the title. Eighteen years later, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine gold deficiency and dismissed.

sentences.chinese: 玄孫
sentences.literal: In Yuankang fourth year, You Che great-great-grandson Zhongmu Gentleman Yong received imperial edict to restore his clan.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Yong, the great-great-grandson of You Che and Gentleman of Zhongmu, received an imperial edict to restore his family.

sentences.chinese: 六世元康四年，右車玄孫之子陽陵不更充國詔復家。
sentences.literal: In Gao Hou seventh year, Kang Marquis Jia succeeded, died after sixteen years.
sentences.idiomatic: In Empress Gao seventh year, Marquis Kang Jia succeeded to the title, dying sixteen years later.

sentences.chinese: 踬嚴侯黃極忠
sentences.literal: In Jianyuan sixth year, Marquis Mai succeeded, died after thirty-three years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Jianyuan, Marquis Mai succeeded to the title, dying thirty-three years later.

sentences.chinese: 以群盜長為臨江將，已而為漢擊臨江王及諸侯，破布，封千戶。
sentences.literal: In Yuanguang sixth year, Marquis Zhuang succeeded, died after eighteen years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Yuanguang, Marquis Zhuang succeeded to the title, dying eighteen years later.

sentences.chinese: 十月戊戌封，二十七年薨。
sentences.literal: In Yuanshuo fourth year, Marquis Qing succeeded, died after twenty-three years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuanshuo, Marquis Qing succeeded to the title, dying twenty-three years later.

sentences.chinese: 百十三
sentences.literal: In Zhenghe fourth year, Marquis Shang succeeded, died after seven years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Zhenghe, Marquis Shang succeeded to the title, dying seven years later.

sentences.chinese: 孝文十二年，夷侯榮成嗣，九年薨。
sentences.literal: In Housheng first year, Marquis Kuang succeeded, died after nineteen years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the first year of Housheng, Marquis Kuang succeeded to the title, dying nineteen years later.

sentences.chinese: 後元五年，共侯明嗣，三十五年薨。
sentences.literal: In Yanxi first year, Marquis Shou succeeded, died after twenty-four years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the first year of Yanxi, Marquis Shou succeeded to the title, dying twenty-four years later.

sentences.chinese: 元朔五年，侯遂嗣，八年，元鼎元年，坐掩搏奪公主馬，髡為城旦。戶四千。
sentences.literal: In Yangshuo fourth year, Marquis Ping succeeded, died after twenty years.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yangshuo, Marquis Ping succeeded to the title, dying twenty years later.

sentences.chinese: 六世元康四年，極忠玄孫之子踬公乘調詔復家。
sentences.literal: Record: 六世元康四年，極忠玄孫之子踬公乘調詔復家。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 六世元康四年，極忠玄孫之子踬公乘調詔復家。

sentences.chinese: 元始元年，賜極忠代後者敞爵關內侯。
sentences.literal: Record: 元始元年，賜極忠代後者敞爵關內侯。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 元始元年，賜極忠代後者敞爵關內侯。

sentences.literal: Record: 博陽節侯周聚
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 博陽節侯周聚

sentences.chinese: 以卒從豐，以隊率入漢，擊項籍成皋有功，為將軍，布反，定吳郡，侯。
sentences.literal: Record: 以卒從豐，以隊率入漢，擊項籍成皋有功，為將軍，布反，定吳郡，侯。

sentences.chinese: 十月辛丑封，二十四年薨。
sentences.literal: Record: 十月辛丑封，二十四年薨。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 十月辛丑封，二十四年薨。

sentences.chinese: 五十三
sentences.literal: Record: 五十三
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 五十三

sentences.chinese: 孝文九年，侯鸱嗣，十五年，孝景元年，有罪，奪爵一級。
sentences.literal: Record: 孝文九年，侯鸱嗣，十五年，孝景元年，有罪，奪爵一級。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 孝文九年，侯鸱嗣，十五年，孝景元年，有罪，奪爵一級。

sentences.literal: Record: 孫
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 孫

sentences.chinese: 元康四年，聚曾孫長陵公乘萬年詔復家。
sentences.literal: Record: 元康四年，聚曾孫長陵公乘萬年詔復家。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 元康四年，聚曾孫長陵公乘萬年詔復家。

sentences.chinese: 陽羨定侯靈常
sentences.literal: Record: 陽羨定侯靈常
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 陽羨定侯靈常

sentences.chinese: 以荊令尹漢五年初從，擊鍾離辚及陳公利幾，徙為漢中大夫，從至陳，取韓信，遷中尉，以擊布，侯，二千戶。
sentences.literal: Record: 以荊令尹漢五年初從，擊鍾離辚及陳公利幾，徙為漢中大夫，從至陳，取韓信，遷中尉，以擊布，侯，二千戶。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 以荊令尹漢五年初從，擊鍾離辚及陳公利幾，徙為漢中大夫，從至陳，取韓信，遷中尉，以擊布，侯，二千戶。

sentences.chinese: 十月壬寅封，十四年薨。
sentences.literal: Record: 十月壬寅封，十四年薨。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 十月壬寅封，十四年薨。

sentences.literal: Record: 百一十九
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 百一十九

sentences.literal: Record: 高后七年，共侯賀嗣，八年薨。
sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 高后七年，共侯賀嗣，八年薨。

sentences.chinese: 元康四年，常玄孫南和大夫橫詔復家。

sentences.idiomatic: Entry: 元康四年，常玄孫南和大夫橫詔復家。

sentences.chinese: 以客從起沛，入漢，用兵擊破齊田解軍，以楚丞相堅守彭城距布軍，功侯，二千戶。
sentences.literal: Record: 以客從起沛，入漢，用兵擊破齊田解軍，以楚丞相堅守彭城距布軍，功侯，二千戶。

sentences.literal: Record: 十月己酉封，十八年薨。

sentences.literal: Record: 八十五

sentences.chinese: 以騎司馬漢王元年從起廢丘，以都尉破田橫、龍且，追籍至東城，以將軍擊布，侯，九百戶。

sentences.literal: Record: 十二月丁亥封，十年薨。
